description:
Giroro`s been kidnapped by a Bitterling, an alien race known for holding extreme grudges for the most trivial of reasons.  Much worse, he`s being held in a desert climate, and the other frogs don`t want to endanger themselves by going there.  But Natsumi is human, and she`s staging her own rescue mission!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi, Giruru Separates? Rescue Mission till Death
夏美 ギロロ散る? 決死の救出作戦 であります
